statements: SELECT * FROM Rewards;
SELECT reward_name, reward_points FROM Rewards WHERE reward_id = 1;
SELECT reward_name, expiration_date FROM Rewards WHERE reward_points > 100;
SELECT * FROM Rewards ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT reward_name, reward_points FROM Rewards WHERE expiration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Rewards WHERE reward_points > 100 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT reward_name, reward_points FROM Rewards WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31' ORDER BY reward_points ASC;
SELECT reward_id, reward_name, expiration_date FROM Rewards WHERE reward_points BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM Rewards WHERE expiration_date < '2022-01-01' AND reward_points % 2 = 0;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_rewards, SUM(reward_points) AS total_points FROM Rewards;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT program_id, program_name FROM loyalty_program WHERE start_date='2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_rewards;
SELECT customer_id, reward_points, last_reward_date FROM customer_rewards;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE program_id = 1;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY program_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_rewards WHERE reward_points > 100 ORDER BY last_reward_date ASC;
SELECT program_id, program_name, start_date FROM loyalty_program WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT program_name, end_date FROM loyalty_program WHERE program_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM loyalty_programs WHERE loyalty_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE reward_points > 100;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, email FROM customer ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT customer_id, program_name FROM loyalty_programs WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer.customer_name, rewards.reward_name FROM customer INNER JOIN rewards ON customer.customer_id = rewards.loyalty_id;
SELECT reward_name, reward_points FROM rewards WHERE reward_points > 100 ORDER BY reward_name ASC;

SELECT customer.customer_name, customer.email, loyalty_programs.program_name FROM customer LEFT JOIN loyalty_programs ON customer.customer_id = loyalty_programs.customer_id WHERE loyalty_programs.end_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY program_id DESC;
SELECT start_date, end_date FROM loyalty_program WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT * FROM customer WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT program_name, start_date FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT reward_name, point_cost FROM reward WHERE point_cost > 50 ORDER BY point_cost ASC;

SELECT c.customer_name, r.reward_name, cr.date_claimed FROM customer c JOIN customer_reward cr ON c.customer_id = cr.customer_id JOIN reward r ON cr.reward_id = r.reward_id ORDER BY cr.date_claimed DESC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs ORDER BY program_id DESC;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM loyalty_programs WHERE program_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE point_cost > 100 ORDER BY reward_id ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, date FROM transactions WHERE amount >= 50 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM loyalty_programs ORDER BY program_name DESC;
SELECT reward_name, point_cost FROM rewards WHERE point_cost > 50 ORDER BY point_cost ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;

SELECT c.customer_name, r.reward_name, cr.date_claimed FROM customers c JOIN customer_rewards cr ON c.customer_id = cr.customer_id JOIN rewards r ON cr.reward_id = r.reward_id ORDER BY cr.date_claimed DESC;
